results.content: The course contains a lot of interesting topics, especially the last half of the course. But the instructur makes a lot of errors during the course, going quickly back and forth in the panels, so you loose track of what is going on.
results.content_html: The course contains a lot of interesting topics, especially the last half of the course. But the instructur makes a lot of errors during the course, going quickly back and forth in the panels, so you loose track of what is going on.

results.content: very informative and the instructor knows what he is talking about, well worth the time.

results.content:
If there was a zero stars rating,  I would have given that. This us by far the worst course I have subscribed to on Udemy. STAY AWAY!!!
There is no explanation of concepts. The guy just reads the notes he copied from Azure AD documentation and I rambles on like it's a discussion over coffee. Total waste of time and money.. :(
